_comment: FY2024 Survey Answer Schema - stores only answers, questions are in template
_savings: ~67% space reduction vs full markdown files

engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.people_who_use_drugs_other: Hopkinton, through its Drug Free Communities Group and local Youth and Families outreach, engages with youth and adults that use drugs on a weekly and/or monthly basis. We are using these interactions to formulate a greater plan and strategy beyond what we are doing now.
engagement_descriptions.people_in_recovery_other: Hopkinton, through its Drug Free Communities Group and local Youth and Families outreach, engages with youth and adults that use drugs on a weekly and/or monthly basis. We are using these interactions to formulate a greater plan and strategy beyond what we are doing now.
engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: Hopkinton, through its Drug Free Communities Group, local Youth and Families outreach and Health Department, engages families with youth and adults that use drugs on a weekly and/or monthly basis. We are using these interactions to formulate a greater plan and strategy beyond what we are doing now. We are also training them in the use of and providing them Narcan.
engagement_descriptions.experts_other: Our Drug Free Communities group, Youth and Family Services Team, Hopkinton Organizing for Prevention Team and Health Department have been working with community members and the school to develop a strategy beyond what we are already doing and have been doing (vaping and drug education in school, Narcan training, hurdles to access through regulation, etc.)

disparities_assessment.other_methods: Hopkinton, through its Drug Free Communities Group, HOP, Health Department and local Youth and Families outreach, engage youth and adults that use or have used drugs, on a weekly and/or monthly basis. We are using these interactions to formulate a greater plan and strategy beyond what we are doing now.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: We are in the process of establishing a comprehensive data tracking process. We had been tracking this data through the PD, FD, Burial Agent, Y&F Services, MDPH and local hospitals.
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: We had been tracking this data through the PD, FD, Burial Agent, Y&F Services, MDPH and local hospitals. We have been providing referral assistance through many of our departments.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: Time. Turnover. We are in the process of overcoming both.

existing_programs._comment: G4: Programs/services to leverage (mostly empty in this example)

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process.

treatment.barriers: We are Drug Free Community grant recipient. We have a vaping/drug diversion program, have been providing Narcan training, kits and fentanyl test strips to the community for over a year and have been providing a host of referral services for over 5 years. We had a number of staff depart. We are in the process of hiring and managing our ever increasing case loads that are not opioid related. We intend to start our planning and engage a consultant this year.

recovery_support.barriers: We are Drug Free Community grant recipient. We have a vaping/drug diversion program, have been providing Narcan training, kits and fentanyl test strips to the community for over a year and have been providing a host of referral services for over 5 years. We had a number of staff depart. We are in the process of hiring and managing our ever increasing case loads that are not opioid related. We intend to start our planning and engage a consultant this year.

We had a number of staff depart. We are in the process of hiring and managing our ever increasing case loads that are not opioid related. We had a number of staff depart. We are in the process of hiring and managing our ever increasing case loads that are not opioid related. pregnant_parenting.barriers: Our Health Department will be designing programming to support moms and their children as part of a greater foundational/functional medicine program, that will tie into all of the Drug Free Communities work that we have been doing.

prevention.barriers: We are Drug Free Community grant recipient. We have a vaping/drug diversion program, have been providing Narcan training, kits and fentanyl test strips to the community for over a year and have been providing a host of referral services for over 5 years. We had a number of staff depart. We are in the process of hiring and managing our ever increasing case loads that are not opioid related. We intend to start our planning and engage a consultant this year.

additional_comments.general: Hopkinton has been actively working to address mental health, tobacco and drug related issues since I started. We are rebuilding our departments. We are about to start the planning process with the intent on supplementing the programming that we already have in place. If we are going to do it, we are going to do it right.
additional_comments.orrf_recommendations: We intend to execute on ORFF's mission and have been under other grants. We intend to supplement what we have and develop new programming once we have rehired staff.
